Package com.chrisgalhur.dice_game.entity

package com.chrisgalhur.dice_game.entity
Contains the entity classes. Provides essential structures to manage the data to communicate with the database.
  • The classes in this package are:
    • DataPlayer: Manages data of player's game.
    • Player: Manages everything related to the game, separate from registration and login.
    • Role: Specifies roles of players that can be in the game.
    • SessionPlayer: Manages the player session; only the name, password, and roles are stored.

    DataPlayer
